com.almasb.fxgl.ui

Class ProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • com.almasb.fxgl.ui.ProgressBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public final class ProgressBar
extends javafx.scene.Parent
    A generic progress bar. Can be used to show health, mana, experience, quest progress, reloading times, etc 

     Example:

 ProgressBar hpBar = new ProgressBar();
 hpBar.setMinValue(0);
 hpBar.setMaxValue(1000);
 hpBar.setCurrentValue(1000);
 hpBar.setWidth(300);
 hpBar.setLabelVisible(true);
 hpBar.setLabelPosition(Position.RIGHT);
 hpBar.setFill(Color.GREEN);

 addUINodes(hpBar);
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)
